TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BinaryReader extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 以特定的編碼方式，將基本資料型別當做二進位值讀取。

span.span: Reads primitive data types as binary values in a specific encoding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供方法，簡化從資料流讀取基本資料型別。The class provides methods that simplify reading primitive data types from a stream. 例如，您可以使用方法來讀取的下一個位元組，做為布林值，並從資料流中的目前位置前移一個位元組。For example, you can use the method to read the next byte as a Boolean value and advance the current position in the stream by one byte. 類別包含讀取支援不同資料類型的方法。The class includes read methods that support different data types. 當您建立的新執行個體類別，您提供要讀取的資料流，並選擇性地指定的編碼類型及是否要保留資料流開啟之後處置物件。When you create a new instance of the class, you provide the stream to read from, and optionally specify the type of encoding and whether to leave the stream open after disposing the object. 如果您未指定編碼類型，則會使用 utf-8。If you do not specify an encoding type, UTF-8 is used. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此類型會實作介面。This type implements the interface. 當您完成使用型別時，您應該處置它直接或間接。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接處置型別，呼叫其方法中的`try` / `catch`區塊。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要處置它間接，使用的語言建構這類`using`（在 C# 中) 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 「 使用物件，實作 IDisposable 」 一節介面 > 主題。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何儲存和擷取檔案中的應用程式設定。The following code example demonstrates how to store and retrieve application settings in a file. [!code-csharp[System.IO.BinaryReaderWriter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BinaryReaderWriter/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.BinaryReaderWriter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BinaryReaderWriter/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 公開 之基礎資料流的存取。

span.span: Exposes access to the underlying stream of the .

value.span: 與 相關聯的基礎資料流。

span.span: The underlying stream associated with the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!CAUTION] > 使用基礎資料流讀取時，或同時使用`BinaryReader`可能會導致資料遺失和損毀。Using the underlying stream while reading or while using the `BinaryReader` can cause data loss and corruption. 例如，可能會多次讀取相同的位元組、 位元組可能會略過，或字元讀取可能會變得無法預測。For example, the same bytes might be read more than once, bytes might be skipped, or character reading might become unpredictable. 如需一般 I/O 工作的清單，請參閱 < [ 一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何讀取和寫入`Double`資料傳送到使用的記憶體`BinaryReader`並類別頂端類別。The following code example shows how to read and write `Double` data to memory by using the `BinaryReader` and classes on top of the class. `MemoryStream` 僅讀取和寫入`Byte`資料。`MemoryStream` only reads and writes `Byte` data. [!code-cpp[System.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWDouble#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWDouble/CPP/rwdouble.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWDouble#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWDouble/CS/rwdouble.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWDouble#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWDouble/VB/rwdouble.vb#1)]

Public Overridable Sub Close ()
public: virtual void Close();
abstract member Close : unit -> unit override this.Close : unit -> unit

summary.span: 關閉目前的讀取器和基礎資料流。

span.span: Closes the current reader and the underlying stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個實作`Close`呼叫方法並傳遞`true`值。This implementation of `Close` calls the method passing a `true` value. 排清資料流不會清除其基礎的編碼器，除非您明確地呼叫或`Close`。Flushing the stream will not flush its underlying encoder unless you explicitly call or `Close`. 設定至`true`表示資料會從排清緩衝區資料流，但並不會清除編碼器的狀態。Setting to `true` means that data will be flushed from the buffer to the stream, but the encoder state will not be flushed. 這可讓編碼器，讓它可以正確編碼字元的下一個區塊保持其狀態 （部分的字元）。This allows the encoder to keep its state (partial characters) so that it can encode the next block of characters correctly. UTF8，UTF7，其中某些字元可以只編碼編碼器接收或多個相鄰的字元後，會影響此案例。This scenario affects UTF8 and UTF7 where certain characters can only be encoded after the encoder receives the adjacent character or characters.

summary.span: 釋放 類別目前的執行個體所使用的全部資源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Dispose` 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 之後呼叫`Dispose`，您必須釋放所有的參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體，所佔用。After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 清除 Unmanaged 資源向上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 `Dispose` 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the . 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void Dispose (bool disposing);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
protected: virtual void Dispose(bool disposing);
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 類別所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the class and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫`Dispose`和。This method is called by `Dispose` and . 根據預設，這個方法會指定`disposing`參數做為`true`。By default, this method specifies the `disposing` parameter as `true`. 指定`disposing`參數做為`false`。 specifies the `disposing` parameter as `false`. `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 在覆寫這個方法，小心不要參考先前處置好的呼叫中的物件。

span.span: When overriding this method, be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需如何實作這個方法的詳細資訊，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement this method, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需詳細資訊並，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源總](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 內部緩衝區大小是 16 和所傳回的值之間較大的值針對指定的編碼方式。The internal buffer size is the larger value between 16 and the value returned by for the specified encoding. 如需一般 I/O 工作的清單，請參閱 < [ 一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md).

span.span: Requested is larger than the internal buffer size.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 surrogate 字元應該會在資料流使用方法，然後將資料流回至原始位置。If surrogate characters can be expected in the stream use the method, then set the stream back to the original position. 如需一般 I/O 工作的清單，請參閱 < [ 一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md).

summary.span: 按照所使用的 和從資料流讀取的特定字元，自基礎資料流讀取字元，並將資料流中目前的位置往前移。

span.span: Reads characters from the underlying stream and advances the current position of the stream in accordance with the used and the specific character being read from the stream.

returns.span: 輸入資料流的下一個字元；如果目前沒有字元可供使用，則為 -1。

span.span: The next character from the input stream, or -1 if no characters are currently available.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 成功讀取之後，不會還原該檔案的位置。 does not restore the file position after an unsuccessful read. 如需一般 I/O 工作的清單，請參閱 < [ 一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何讀取及寫入使用記憶體做為備份存放區的資料。The following example shows how to read and write data using memory as a backing store. 本範例會顯示到主控台檔案無效路徑字元清單。This example displays a list of invalid file path characters to the console. 雖然程式碼會嘗試顯示的 無效的檔案路徑的所有字元清單，不是所有的字元是可顯示的一組字元內。Although the code tries to display a list of all invalid file path characters, not all of the characters are within the displayable set of characters. 因為無效的字元清單可以異系統，此程式碼的輸出可能也會有所不同。Because the list of invalid characters can vary based on the system, output for this code may also vary. remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行失敗的讀取作業之後，不會還原該檔案的位置。 does not restore the file position after an unsuccessful read operation. 如需一般 I/O 工作的清單，請參閱 < [ 一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何寫入二進位資料做為備份存放區使用的記憶體。The following example shows how to write binary data by using memory as a backing store. 它會顯示訊息，指出資料是否已正確地寫入主控台。It displays a message to the console that indicates whether the data was written correctly. [!code-csharp[System.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWBytes2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWBytes2/CS/rwreadbytes.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWBytes2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWBytes2/VB/rwreadbytes.vb#1)] 此範例會讀取檔案的內容，並 16 欄格式顯示每個位元組的數字值。This example reads the contents of a file and displays each byte's numeric value in 16-column format. 正在讀取檔案的結尾偵測到當方法會傳回零個位元組。The end of the file that is being read is detected when the method returns zero bytes. [!code-csharp[System.IO.BinaryReaderWriter#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BinaryReaderWriter/CS/source5.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.IO.BinaryReaderWriter#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BinaryReaderWriter/VB/source5.vb#6)]

summary.span: 由字元陣列中的指定點開始，從資料流讀取指定字元數。

returns.span: 如果目前沒有足夠的位元組數，這可能會小於要求的位元組數；如果已到達資料流末端，則可能為零。

span.span: This might be less than the number of characters requested if that many characters are not currently available, or it might be zero if the end of the stream is reached.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行失敗的讀取作業之後，不會還原該檔案的位置。 does not restore the file position after an unsuccessful read operation. 如需一般 I/O 工作的清單，請參閱 < [ 一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何讀取及寫入使用記憶體做為備份存放區的資料。The following example shows how to read and write data using memory as a backing store. 本範例會顯示到主控台檔案無效路徑字元清單。This example displays a list of invalid file path characters to the console. 雖然程式碼會嘗試顯示的 無效的檔案路徑的所有字元清單，不是所有的字元是可顯示的一組字元內。Although the code tries to display a list of all invalid file path characters, not all of the characters are within the displayable set of characters. 因為無效的字元清單可以異系統，此程式碼的輸出可能也會有所不同。Because the list of invalid characters can vary based on the system, output for this code may also vary. remarks.format: ## Remarks 成功讀取之後，不會還原該檔案的位置。 does not restore the file position after an unsuccessful read. 資料格式的衝突，因為不建議使用此方法搭配下列編碼方式：Because of data formatting conflicts, using this method with the following encodings is not recommended: - UTF-7UTF-7 - ISO-2022-JPISO-2022-JP - ISCIIISCII 如需一般 I/O 工作的清單，請參閱 < [ 一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何寫入二進位資料做為備份存放區中，使用記憶體，並確認資料已正確地寫入。The following code example shows how to write binary data using memory as a backing store, and then verify that the data was written correctly. [!code-cpp[System.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWByte#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWByte/CPP/rwbyte.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWByte#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWByte/CS/rwbyte.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWByte#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWByte/VB/rwbyte.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行失敗的讀取作業之後，不會還原該檔案的位置。 does not restore the file position after an unsuccessful read operation. 如需一般 I/O 工作的清單，請參閱 < [ 一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何寫入二進位資料做為備份存放區中，使用記憶體，並確認資料已正確地寫入。The following code example shows how to write binary data using memory as a backing store, and then verify that the data was written correctly. summary.span: 按照所使用的 和從資料流讀取的特定字元，自目前資料流讀取下一個字元，並將資料流中目前的位置往前移。

span.span: Reads the next character from the current stream and advances the current position of the stream in accordance with the used and the specific character being read from the stream.

returns.span: 自目前資料流讀取的字元。

span.span: A character read from the current stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果就會引發例外狀況中讀取資料流中的 surrogate 字元的方法嘗試和資料流中的位置會前進。If the method attempts to read a surrogate character in the stream an exception will be raised and the position in the stream will advance. 位置還原到原始位置之前如果呼叫的資料流是不可搜尋; 不過，如果資料流不可搜尋，位置將不會更正。The position is restored to the original location before was called if the stream is seekable; however, if the stream is unseekable, the position will not be corrected. 如果資料流中預期會有 surrogate 字元，使用方法改為。If surrogate characters can be expected in the stream, use the method instead. 資料格式的衝突，因為不建議使用此方法搭配下列編碼方式：Because of data formatting conflicts, using this method with the following encodings is not recommended: - UTF-7UTF-7 - ISO-2022-JPISO-2022-JP - ISCIIISCII 如需一般 I/O 工作的清單，請參閱 < [ 一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何讀取及寫入使用記憶體做為備份存放區的資料。The following code example shows how to read and write data using memory as a backing store. summary.span: 讀取目前資料流中的指定字元數，並將資料傳入字元陣列中，然後依據使用的 以及正在從資料流中讀取的指定字元，前移目前的位置。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行失敗的讀取作業之後，不會還原該檔案的位置。 does not restore the file position after an unsuccessful read operation. 從網路資料流，在某些罕見的情況下，讀取時方法可能會讀取額外的字元資料流如果建構以 Unicode 編碼方式。When reading from network streams, in some rare cases, the method might read an extra character from the stream if the was constructed with Unicode encoding. 如果發生這種情況，您可以使用方法來讀取為固定長度位元組陣列，並接著傳遞至該陣列方法。If this occurs, you can use the method to read a fixed-length byte array, and then pass that array to the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何讀取及寫入使用記憶體做為備份存放區的資料。The following code example shows how to read and write data using memory as a backing store. remarks.format: ## Remarks 成功讀取之後，不會還原該檔案的位置。 does not restore the file position after an unsuccessful read. `BinaryReader` 讀取位元組由小到大格式的這個資料型別。`BinaryReader` reads this data type in little-endian format. 如需一般 I/O 工作的清單，請參閱 < [ 一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何讀取和寫入`Double`資料傳送到使用的記憶體`BinaryReader`並類別頂端類別。The following code example shows how to read and write `Double` data to memory by using the `BinaryReader` and classes on top of the class. `MemoryStream` 僅讀取和寫入`Byte`資料。`MemoryStream` only reads and writes `Byte` data. [!code-cpp[System.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWDouble#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWDouble/CPP/rwdouble.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWDouble#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWDouble/CS/rwdouble.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWDouble#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWDouble/VB/rwdouble.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 成功讀取之後，不會還原該檔案的位置。 does not restore the file position after an unsuccessful read. 讀取位元組由小到大格式的這個資料型別。 reads this data type in little-endian format. 如需一般 I/O 工作的清單，請參閱 < [ 一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何儲存和擷取檔案中的應用程式設定。The following code example demonstrates how to store and retrieve application settings in a file. summary.span: 自目前資料流讀取字串。

span.span: Reads a string from the current stream.

summary.span: 字串會以長度為前置字元，每次以七位元編碼為一整數。

span.span: The string is prefixed with the length, encoded as an integer seven bits at a time.

returns.span: 讀取的字串。

span.span: The string being read.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 成功讀取之後，不會還原該檔案的位置。 does not restore the file position after an unsuccessful read. 如需一般 I/O 工作的清單，請參閱 < [ 一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何儲存和擷取檔案中的應用程式設定。The following code example demonstrates how to store and retrieve application settings in a file. summary.span: 釋放 所使用的所有資源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫可讓所使用的資源重新配置用於其他用途。Calling allows the resources used by the to be reallocated for other purposes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 清除 Unmanaged 資源總](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。For more information about , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).
